```{r message=FALSE}
library( magrittr )
library( tidyr )
library( dplyr )
library( ggplot2 )
```

```{r}
flightsURL <- 'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/SmilodonCub/DATA607/master/flightssample_data607.csv'
flights_df <- read.csv( flightsURL ,stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
flights_df
```

```{r}
colnames( flights_df ) <- c('Carrier', 'Status', 'LAX', 'PHX', 'SAN', ' SFO', 'SEA')
flights_df <- flights_df %>% filter_all(all_vars(!is.na(.))) 
%>% mutate_if(is.character, list(~na_if(.,""))) 
%>% fill(Carrier)
flights_df
```
